sys_remote_update_set.description: Fixes "Generic IT Request" workflow and "Other IT Service Request" catalog item behavior. Fixes organizational element usage issues and adds documentation to clarify org structure governance. Contains a fix to reduce excessive log chatter (ServiceNow KB Number KB0831650).

sys_update_xml.payload:
trueThis page contains information pertaining to an incident that has been submitted.

An incident is an unplanned interruption, degradation or failure of an IT device or service. Devices and services can include things such as computer hardware, logins, websites and software programs.

Use the "Take a Tour" link below this text for details on each field.

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_b6b6e7efdb41f340683b300f7c96194b
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueThis page contains information pertaining to an incident that has been submitted.

An incident is an unplanned interruption, degradation or failure of an IT device or service. Devices and services can include things such as computer hardware, logins, websites and software programs.

Use the "Select Tour" link at the bottom of this help article for details on each field.

Quick Tips:

  • The Assigned To field should be set before work begins on resolving an incident.
  • If you need to create a Problem record for an incident, use the "Problem" field in the "Related Records" tab. When you click on the search icon next to the field, you can use the "New" button to create a new Problem record.
  • If you need to create a new Change record to resolve an incident, use the "Change Request" field in the "Related Records" tab. When you click on the search icon next to the field, you can use the "New" button to create a new Change record (this includes Standard, Normal and Emergency changes).
]]>normalincident-itilincident1282bf1fac6112285017366cb5f867469300falsesys_embedded_help_contenterwinel_da2019-05-02 21:42:32global/b6b6e7efdb41f340683b300f7c96194b10incident-itilglobalglobalsys_embedded_help_content_b6b6e7efdb41f340683b300f7c96194berwinel_da2020-12-07 23:23:20n

sys_update_xml.comments: Fix redirection to user edit form so the form is opened with the appropriate view.
sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_2f9986cc07070010683af0269c1ed03e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Makes an ajax call to x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager to retrieve any messages that need to be displayed to the user upon login. If the results of this call indicate that the user's profile is non-compliant, they will be redirected to the user edit form after the dialog is closed.</description><global>true</global><name>USASOC_OnLogin</name><script><![CDATA[var USASOC_OnLogin = (function () {
    var USASOC_OnLogin = {
        UI_PAGE_ID: "x_44813_usasoc_cst_profile_incomplete_warning",
        SESSION_CHECKED_VALUE: "true2",
        type: "USASOC_OnLogin",
        _isChecked: false
    };
    function setValidated() {
        USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = true;
        window.sessionStorage.setItem(USASOC_OnLogin.UI_PAGE_ID, USASOC_OnLogin.SESSION_CHECKED_VALUE);
    }
    USASOC_OnLogin.onDialogClose = function () {
        setValidated();
        USASOC_OnLogin._dialogWindow.destroy();
        USASOC_OnLogin._dialogWindow = null;
        g_navigation.open=("/sys_user.do?sys_id=" + g_user.userID + "&sysparm_view=ess");
    };
    addLateLoadEvent(function () {
        try {
            var tableName = '';
            if (typeof g_form !== 'undefined' && null != g_form) {
                jslog('g_form.getTableName() == ' + ((typeof g_form.getTableName() !== 'undefined') ? JSON.stringify(g_form.getTableName()) : 'undefined'));
                if (typeof g_form.getTableName() === 'string')
                    tableName = g_form.getTableName();
            }
            else if (typeof window.opener != 'undefined' && null != window.opener && typeof window.opener.g_form !== 'undefined' && null != window.opener.g_form) {
                if (typeof window.opener.g_form.getTableName() === 'string')
                    tableName = window.opener.g_form.getTableName();
            }
            if (tableName == 'sys_user' && !g_user.hasRole('admin')) {
                window.sessionStorage.setItem(USASOC_OnLogin.UI_PAGE_ID, "");
                USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = false;
                return;
            }
            if (USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked)
                return;
            if (window.sessionStorage.getItem(USASOC_OnLogin.UI_PAGE_ID) == USASOC_OnLogin.SESSION_CHECKED_VALUE || g_user.hasRole('admin')) {
                USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = true;
                return;
            }
            // Temporarily set to true to prevent multiple calls
            USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = true;
            var ga = new GlideAjax("x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager");
            ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserNotifications');
            ga.setErrorCallback(function (result) {
                USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = false;
                if (typeof result.error !== 'undefined' && null != result.error) {
                    var s = ('' + result.error).trim();
                    if (s.length > 0) {
                        jslog('Error response from x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager: ' + s);
                        return;
                    }
                }
                jslog('Error response from x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager: ' + result.responseText);
            });
            ga.getXMLAnswer(function (result) {
                USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = false;
                var notifications = JSON.parse(result);
                if (notifications.profileCompliance.failed == 0) {
                    setValidated();
                    jslog('x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager: ' + notifications.profileCompliance.message);
                    return;
                }
                var dialogClass = (window.GlideModal) ? GlideModal : GlideDialogWindow;
                USASOC_OnLogin._dialogWindow = new dialogClass(USASOC_OnLogin.UI_PAGE_ID, true);
                USASOC_OnLogin._dialogWindow.setTitle('User Profile Incomplete');
                USASOC_OnLogin._dialogWindow.render();
                jslog('x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager: ' + notifications.profileCompliance.message);
            });
        }
        catch (e) {
            USASOC_OnLogin._isChecked = false;
            jslog("Error invoking GlideAjax for x_44813_usasoc_cst.UsasocUserNotificationManager: " + e);
        }
    });
    return USASOC_OnLogin;
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erwinel_da</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-14 00:08:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>2f9986cc07070010683af0269c1ed03e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>USASOC_OnLogin</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_2f9986cc07070010683af0269c1ed03e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erwinel_da</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-07 20:51:37</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_embedded_help_content_3bf52c441bcda0101497a820f54bcb33
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueDefine a Company

Overview

Companies represent the divisional parent/subordinate structure of organizational units.

  • Each Company can contain one or more Business Units. A Business Unit represents a functional structure within a parent organizational unit (company).
  • Business Units can contain one or more Departments. A Department represents an organizational unit to which members are assigned.
    • If a parent organizational unit has no defined functional structure then it should have one Business Unit with the same name as the company.
    • If a Company has only one Department, and therefore, only one Business Unit, then it is okay if the Company, Business Unit and Department all share the same name.
IMPORTANT! People can be assigned directly to a company. However, it is required that customers and ITIL users are assigned to a Department in order to use ServiceNow. Also, companies that customers and ITIL users belong to (whether directory or indirectly), should have the "Customer" checkbox checked.
FieldDescription
Name
Name of the organizational unit. This should be the unit abbreviation or a short name that is commonly understood.
Customer
Select this box to indicate that this is part of the organization that is served by this ServiceNow instance.
Parent
The parent organizational unit.
Manufacturer
Select this box to indicate that this is part of an organization that is a manufacturer.
Vendor
Select this box to indicate that this is part of an organization that is a vendor.
Notes
This should include the full name of the organizational unit as well as any other names or designations it is known by.
